arts.ttl: Official – Inter Milan Midfielder Kristjan Asllani Joins Torino On Loan With Purchase Option
arts.sum: Inter Milan midfielder Kristjan Asllani has joined Torino on loan with a purchase option. The Nerazzurri confirm that the Albanian has made the switch in an official announcement. He leaves after three years at the club, having joined from Empoli in 2022. arts.ttl: Ex Bayern Munich Star Still On The Market But Set To Start Inter Milan Vs Torino Serie A Opener
arts.sum: Benjamin Pavard is still on the market, but will nevertheless start Inter Milan’s Serie A opener against Torino.
